ygData.subject: Re: Sigh...jewelry
ygData.msgSnippet: This one disturbed me too.  Let s just hope that the diamondine is rare enough that its price is far more than our ambers.
ygData.messageBody:
This one disturbed me too. Let's just hope that the diamondine is rare
enough that its price is far more than our ambers.

--- "Dorris, Bob" <bob_dorris@...> wrote:
> From: "Dorris, Bob" <bob_dorris@...>
>
> Is there any jewelry we make that isn't found in the
> game that isn't better
> then what we can make?
>
> Diamonddine Earring
> STR +3 HP: +12 AC2
>
> Those start getting handed out....so much for mine
> that took me 1200 plat to
> learn how to do.
>
>
>
> Asking if computers can think is like asking if
> submarines can swim.
>
>
>
> -Bob
>
